scripts.build: npx rimraf dist && tsc --p tsconfig.json && npx webpack --config webpack.dev.config.js && xcopy .\src\web\assets\*.* .\dist\assets\ && move .\dist\bundle.js .\dist\assets\
scripts.deploy: git describe --abbrev=0 > VERSION && powershell ./deploy.ps1 && del VERSION
scripts.cloud:build: npx rimraf dist && tsc --p tsconfig.json && npx webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js && mkdir ./dist/assets && cp ./src/web/assets/*.* ./dist/assets/ && mv ./dist/bundle.js ./dist/assets/ && npm run 'cloud:version'
scripts.cloud:start: pm2 start dist/index.js --name td && pm2 list
